Interface IPlayer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPlayer, AIPlayer, HumanPlayer

    public interface IPlayer
    This class is an interface for IPlayer
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    btdiem

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addController(IGameController controller)
      Register itself with IGameController
      IGameController only handles HumanPlayer
      IPlayer getOpponent()
      Return the opponent player of current IPlayer
      PlayerState getState() 
      void move(IBoard board)
      This action is done by HumanPlayer or AIPlayer
      The state of IBoard will be changed following their actions

      Set a opponent player for the current IPlayer
      void setState(PlayerState state)
      Set PlayerState value for IPlayer
